summary: First early-morning loop along the beachfront; light headwind turn.
insight: Starting slow made me notice more—the way light hits the water.

summary: Gentle inclines around the lake, birdsong, fewer cars.
insight: Breathing matched cadence; effort felt smoother than last time.

summary: Street art ride with classmate interviews and coffee stop.
insight: Talking to mural artists reminded me to observe details for design inspiration.

summary: Steep ridge climb with strong crosswinds at the top.
insight: Chunking the climb into lamppost goals reduced overwhelm.

summary: Foggy afternoon by the lighthouse with minimal traffic.
insight: Sound of waves helped keep cadence steady; reflection prompt felt natural.

summary: Shady river ride with classmates, practicing hand signals.
insight: Teaching signals aloud reinforced safe-riding habits.

summary: Long lake loop; sunset rewarded the final push.
insight: Nutrition planning needs attention—energy dipped before kilometer 20.

summary: Recovery spin focusing on posture and breathing.
insight: Short journaling break mid-ride made the reflection feel more authentic.
